ygData.subject: RE: Where to go at my level?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can go to Unrest now. Beetles would be good,possibly solo. Might be low blue to you now though. Get grouped up and start tackling jack-o-lanterns and other
ygData.messageBody:
You can go to Unrest now. Beetles would be good,possibly solo. Might be low
blue to you now though. Get grouped up and start tackling jack-o-lanterns
and other lawn trash. Don't go in the house tho...bad juju...

-----Original Message-----
From: Tanthalias [mailto:tanthalas@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 7:54 PM
To: eqcheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Where to go at my level?


I was wondering if anyone could tell me where I should be hunting as a level
12 bard. Ever since level 8 I've been in Steamfront killing skeles and
clockworks. Now everything con's green (except for mino's, and they're
usually heavily camped). Where should I be hunting now? Crushbone is way too
overpopulated, on Tarew Marr at least. I just need somewhere to hunt until I
hit 14 then I'll go to Unrest. Thanks for any help.

Tanthalias
Half Elven Bard, 12th Level
Tarew Marr
